tool_description: Zloadr Professional API endpoints for cryptocurrencies. This category currently includes 8 endpoints:
name: Cryptocurrency
title: Cryptocurrency

api_list.name: Metadata
api_list.description: Returns all static metadata for one or more cryptocurrencies including name, symbol, logo, and its various registered URLs.     pass one or more comma-separated cryptocurrency symbols. Example: "ETH,BTC".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-cryptocurrency-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/cryptocurrency/info?symbol=ETH,BTC"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-cryptocurrency-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List Quotes (latest)
api_list.description: pass one or more comma-separated cryptocurrency code to see conversions. Example: "EUR,GBP,BTC".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-cryptocurrency-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/cryptocurrency/quotes?symbol=ETH,BTC&convert=GBP,EUR"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-cryptocurrency-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Ticker
api_list.description: Lists all market pairs for the specified cryptocurrency with associated stats. Use the "convert" option to return market values in multiple fiat and cryptocurrency conversions in the same call.    In this input you can pass in which convert price you want see. Example /ticker/BTC/?convert=BCH, /ticker/BTC/?convert=GBP,  /ticker/BTC/?convert=BCH,GBP
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-cryptocurrency-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/ticker/BTC"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-cryptocurrency-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
